text: Libby is a city of Montana in the United States. It is the county seat of Lincoln County. As of the 2020 census, 2,775 people lived there. Libby is in the Kootenai National Forest, between the Cabinet Mountains to the south and the Purcell Mountains to the north. It is along the Kootenai River, and downstream from the Libby Dam. Libby is at an elevation of above sea level. Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana
title: Libby, Montana
